New Records: Aaron Judge hit his 14th career postseason home run
Key Match Events: Gleyber Torres reached base leading off for the fifth time in the playoffs
Steven Kwan extended his Cleveland-record postseason hitting streak to 12 games
José Ramírez hit a ninth-inning home run off Luke Weaver
Rookie shortstop Brayan Rocchio and right fielder Will Brennan committed run-scoring errors for the Guardians
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees lead the ALCS 2-0 for the first time since 2009 against the Los Angeles Angels
Aaron Judge expressed no comment on his home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland went 0-for-7 with runners in scoring position and stranded 11 runners
Gerrit Cole escaped two-on, one-out trouble in the third and then a bases-loaded, one-out jam in the fourth
Winner Clay Holmes, Tim Hill and Tommy Kahnle combined for 3 2/3 scoreless innings
